name: Reworked 1960's Paisley Dress & Mini Tote Bag UK Size 10
description:
This dress and bag has been lovingly reworked from a 1960's maxi dress
The details are a fitted shift dress with roll collar, cap sleeves and CB zip.
There is a matching reversible mini tote bag

The fabric is a medium weight bark cloth with striking paisley design
The dress measures
Bust 93 cms
Waist 75 cms
Hip 96 cms
CB length 92 cms
Sleeve opening  32 cms

A cool 30 degree wash is recommended

name: Fringed Batwing Top Size 12
description:
This batwing top has been lovingly handmade by Juliette's Thread
The details are a narrow fringing dangling around the slash neck.
The shape is a loose batwing great with high waisted garments

The fabric is a soft navy jersey with a silver lurex thread to give is a sparkle !

A cool handwash is recommended
Our model is also wearing High waisted Levi's 501's £22
 & Mini Tote Bag ( Small Birdie Print ) £8

name: Happy Shopper Tote Bag
description:
This " Happy Shopper " tote bag has been lovingly handmade by Juliette's Thread using vintage fabrics from both garments and furnishings.

The bag is lined with a cotton calico for strength with an internal pocket. The bag has a gusset for added depth, and has double handles.
 The dimensions are 
Height: 43 cms
Width : 45 cms
Handle length 70 cms

name: Cutaway Cheetah Crop Top
description:
This cutaway crop top has been made lovingly  by Juliette's Thread from a 1960's kaftan.
Made in a soft jersey fabric with cheetah print design.
It has a cute front neck cutaway detail. 
It fastens at the back neck with a rouleau loop and vintage button.

The shape is a cap sleeve crop top.

Easycare jersey fabric machine washable.

Our model also wears Brown Velvet High waisted shorts £30

name: Reworked cutaway 1970's Floral shirt size 10
description:
Juliette's Thread has reworked this 1970's floral shirt.
The details are the cutaway front neck and fly away collar with a
semi fitted shape.
Long sleeves with double buttoned cuff.

Bust measures 94 cms
Centre back length 61 cms
Fabric is a easy care light polyester


UK Size 10 - 12
